description: Issei is being given lessons in magic by Akeno. After getting the living hell beaten out of him, he spills a parfait on her. She requests him to lick it off her chest. At this point, Issei wakes up in Asia`s lap and gets shocked by Rassei.

titles.title: Mousou Bakuyure Kaijo Original Video Vol. 2: Akeno-senpai, Kojin Shugyou Desu wa
妄想爆揺解除オリジナルビデオVol.2 ~朱乃先輩,個人修行ですわ~
